test.name: Checkout Product Test

kw.name: Open Home Page
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Selenium Implicit Wait
kw.doc: Sets the implicit wait value used by Selenium.
Opens the home page of the application.

kw.name: Verify Home Page Title
Get Title
kw.doc: Returns the title of the current page.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.
Verifies that the home page title is correct.

kw.name: Search for product
Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
Searches for a product on the home page.

kw.name: Verify Search Result
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.
Verifies that the search result matches the expected result.

kw.name: Add product to cart
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Contain
kw.msg: Element 'xpath=//div[contains(@class, 'alert alert-success alert-dismissible')]' contains text 'Success: You have added MacBook to your shopping cart!'.
kw.arg: Success: You have added MacBook to your shopping cart!
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.
Adds a product to the cart.And verifies Success message.

kw.name: Click Checkout Button
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
Clicks the checkout button to proceed with the purchase.

kw.name: Verify_checkout_page
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.
Verifies that the checkout page is displayed correctly.

test.doc: This test case verifies that a product can be checked out successfully.
